typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		body as (error as (code as string, message as string)),
		headers as [string,string]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	entity: '/subscriptions/1e42591f-1f0c-4c5a-b7f2-a268f6105ec5/resourceGroups/keshADF_test/providers/Microsoft.DataFactory/factories/KeshWestEurope/pipelines/WebCallPipeline?api-version=2018-06-01',
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'documentPerLine']) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	insertHttpMethod: 'POST',
	deleteHttpMethod: 'DELETE',
	upsertHttpMethod: 'PUT',
	updateHttpMethod: 'PATCH',
	requestFormat: ['type' -> 'json'],
	format: 'rest',
	timeout: 30,
	entity: 'https://keshfunctions.azurewebsites.net/api/HttpTrigger6',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		body,
		headers
	)) ~> sink1
